stimulusHtml: In the mural Dream of a Sunday Afternoon in the Alameda Park, Diego Rivera included figures that spanned four centuries most probably to convey the idea that
choicesHtml: artists and writers have played a critical role in Mexico’s history
all Mexicans are a part of the country’s rich, ongoing history
